text:
@MollyJongFast If true, this is criminal. Kushner had detailed plan to manage Coronavirus. But they found Dem cities & states like NYC were initially more affected (not trump supporters). So they intentionally scrapped the entire plan to let the “blue” areas suffer

https://t.co/CB3BsYcTS8
